title: Before the Apocalypse: A Young Adult Coming of Age Fantasy and Supernatural Thriller: I AM HIM
description:
Can he control the beast within?Jacob is just like any other high school boy. He tries to make new friends and figure out the opposite sex, but he harbors a dark secret that isolates him from everyone else - schizophrenia. And the voice inside his head goads him to do horrific things.Can Jacob control his darker alter ego, or will tragedy unleash the beast hiding within? And more alarming, why and who are the outside forces pushing Jacob to reveal his darker side?Bestselling author Scott W Kimak tells the origin story of his most memorable character in this action-packed supernatural thriller. If you like stories that keep you on the edge of your seat then you'll love I AM HIM.
Buy I AM HIM and get ready for the ride of your life today!
author: Scott W Kimak
